*unintelligible yelling rant* *dies from heart attack*

 

Touching a large red and black slug( @Kimera Industries knows what I'm talking about)

"Aww, who's a good boy? Who's a good-" *internal screaming* *Boomslug is happy*

Using a thumb drive to transfer screenshots from your KSP computer to your internet computer

Edited November 16, 2023 by Kimera Industries

"Whoops, forgot to eject the USB drive. Surely-" *data corrupted and lost forever*

Attempting to RickRoll a close friend.

*It was during their wedding* "Come on, guys- just a joke! A little harmless prank is all!"

Waking up at 5:50 to watch Starship IFT 2 only to have some fake SpaceX account "stream" it "live" in order to sell cryptocurrency. (Yes this happened to me today) (Yes I am mad)

"Maybe I should buy some of this crypto?"

Getting 2 hours of sleep so you can watch the entirety of NSF's live stream.

Why are there so many donations

 

Hmmm what a lovely boostback burn we have here what the worse that could happen

Im just going to command full throttle and leave it at full power. This will be fun!

Ill just place this fork with my food. Its harmless. <presses start>

hmm the tea tastes funny *BOOOM*

second stage is in terminal guidance.

When you say "WOOOOOOOOOOOOOO"

"Hey, Elon, I just thought of a great reason to have an abort system right now."

Dedicating all of your time to KSP and realizing that, well, you've dedicated all your time to KSP.

"Worth it."

"Wait, why is the parachute melting?"

Not bothering with a LES because it adds too much mass.

"What do you mean you disabled revert to Vab!?!"

Turning all the graphics settings on KSP2 to max and launching an orbital megastructure.

"Hey, the FPS isn't so bad in the VAB, right?" *clicks launch*

Getting a new monitor and finding out you have to go on a quest deep in the settings to fix its obscure problem.

"Plugging one Monitor into the Motherboard and plugging another into the Gpu will be fine right?"
